entry.title: The Contract
entry.summary:
Author: imanaddictiveiguess

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 15,224Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 21

Summary: Eons upon eons have passed since Hadrian "Harry Potter" Black became Death's master. Now expertly wielding powers that preside over both death and magic throughout all of existence and his world now long gone; Hadrian after mourning his friends and long lost world eventually took Death's offer and stayed by their side balancing the cosmos. Now millennia afterwards Death saw it fit to drop him in a new reality where super heroes and villains exist often facing world ending disasters like every other Tuesday. His new duty is that he must help keep this universe from imploding on itself all while on "vacation". No big deal…right?

entry.title: Blue & Grey
entry.summary:
Author: 09026il

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,249Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 1

Summary: Blue is hope: the light that is sought when the world falls apart, when everything around you collapses or when half the planet seems to be dying. Gray is fear: a veil of terror that silences reason, that chains those who fear for their lives or for the unexpected. It's the tremor of not knowing if there will be one more second to breathe.Why were those colors changing? They didn't even look good. Or also where the life of Clark and Bruce is going to shit, with no one to trust more than themselves, both being a help to each other.

Summary: Newly single and in an odd place since the breakup, Clark is dragged by Lois to Gotham's most glamorous party. entry.title: Every Inch of You
entry.summary:
Author: acatcam

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 26,347Chapters: 17/?Kudos: 162

Summary: "This is a love story." | "This is a detective story"When Clark Kent follows a story into Gotham, he doesn’t expect to find himself face-to-face with the city’s true guardian: a bat with fangs, claws, and a half-feral silhouette in the shadows. Suspicious, circling him like prey, Batman tests every ounce of Clark’s resolve—only for Clark’s clumsy optimism to slip through anyway (“What the hay, are those fangs?”).Between the silk shawls and champagne smiles of Bruce Wayne, Gotham’s Pretty Boy Playboy, and the smudged-eyeliner hunger of the Bat with Fangs, Clark finds himself drawn to both—the golden boy in the sun and the monster in the dark. He doesn’t break Bruce’s walls with force, but with patience, reverence, and devotion.The monster who refuses to hurt the one he loves, and the hero who would even offer his own blood to keep him alive.

entry.title: Gods Don't Belong in Gotham
entry.summary:
Author: Anonymous

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 25,546Chapters: 5/?Kudos: 197

Summary: “Well?” he asked, his voice low.A pause.His eyes dragged over Clark, not with drunken lust but with something sharper.“You here to watch… or join? Might as well make it a threesome.”Clark choked on his own spit so hard he nearly doubled over, coughing. It's been 5 years since both Superman and Batman began their separate crusades. Both curious but cautious.Clark remains in Metropolis, respecting the Dark Knight's strict rule to keep metas out of Gotham. Meanwhile, Bruce is consumed with finding a balance between Batman and Bruce Wayne, determine to not repeat mistakes of the past. But it's hard to do that when he is too stubborn to accept help. Fortunately, for him Clark is just as stubborn.Their paths cross when Clark is sent to cover a gala in Gotham, stepping into the city he's barred from. What begins as a professional obligation turns into an unforgettable collision with Gotham's once reclusive billionaire. Or Clark and Bruce fall for each other slowly yet quickly.
